title: I’m in Trouble Because The Emperor Thinks My Time is Limited - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Different Social Status   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Mysterious Illness   Nobles   Possessive Characters   Sickly Characters   Sword And Magic
author: 도장공인
description:
Lindel is the youngest vice commander of the Imperial guards who had everything but love.

I made one wrong wish and started vomiting blood.
It was just an aftereffect of the contract. But the problem was that other people saw me vomiting blood.
I tried to fix things up but for some reason, it gets worse and worse.

Now I was a lover of the century who wished to protect the Emperor even at the risk of death.

'How long have you endured this alone?'

'Don't worry, I'm okay.'

'I'd rather you cry! Beg to live, be angry!'
'.....Don't die, please.'

No, I'm not going to die!>
